Second UserStory: so that I can more #conveniently use# the #website#.
First UserStory: so that I can more #conveniently use# the #website#.

Text.Second UserStory: user_story_12: #G04# As a user, I want to choose a flexible pick up time, so that I can more #conveniently use# the #website#.
Text.First UserStory: user_story_05: #G04# As a user, I want to have a flexible pick up time, so that I can more #conveniently use# the #website#.

Text.Second UserStory: user_story_10: #G04# As a user, I want to be able to view a map display of the special waste drop off sites around my area.
Text.First UserStory: user_story_09: #G04# As a user, I want to be able to view a map display of the public recycling bins around my area.

Second UserStory: so that I can #have# a #sense# of my company's performance.
First UserStory: so that I can #have# a #sense# of what people are doing on our sites and know the service status.

Text.Second UserStory: user_story_24: #G04# As an executive, I want to have full access to data related to my company, so that I can #have# a #sense# of my company's performance.
Text.First UserStory: user_story_22: #G04# As an admin, I want to view a dashboard that monitors all the sites' statuses, so that I can #have# a #sense# of what people are doing on our sites and know the service status.

Text.Second UserStory: user_story_50: #G04# As a recyclingfacility representative, I want to have access to user stats and schedules, so that I can adjust my hours and/or upgrade equipment and capacity in order to be able to accomodate larger amounts of recyclable materials.
Text.First UserStory: user_story_26: #G04# As an employee from the HR department, I want to have access to the full information of all employees working for this business.
